remarks: Reconstruction of a subspace from a dual subspace of functionals with closed kernels.  Our proof was suggested by Mario Carneiro, 20-Feb-2015.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Mar-2015.)
statement:
lcfr.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lcfr.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcfr.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcfr.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` U ) $.
lcfr.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` U ) $.
lcfr.l $e |- L = ( LKer ` U ) $.
lcfr.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` U ) $.
lcfr.t $e |- T = ( LSubSp ` D ) $.
lcfr.c $e |- C = { f e. F | ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` ( L ` f ) ) ) = ( L ` f ) } $.
lcfr.q $e |- Q = U_ g e. R ( ._|_ ` ( L ` g ) ) $.
lcfr.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
lcfr.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. T ) $.
lcfr.rs $e |- ( ph -> R C_ C ) $.
lcfr $p |- ( ph -> Q e. S ) $.
$d ._|_ f g $.
$d F f $.
$d L f g $.
$d R g $.
$d U f $.
